title: Life's great, thumbs up!
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Human Services, funding
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/People with disabilities
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness
abstract: I have a family that makes me smile
description: Edmund tells his story about family, his sporting interests including bike-riding, his involvement with Alkira (a centre for people with intellectual disabilities), his work as a volunteer at Box Hill Hospital, his love for music, and his role as a member of the L'Arche community. This project was funded by the Department of Human Services, (Eastern Metropolitan Region), developed and executed in partnership with MetroAccess at the City of Monash and City of Whitehorse, and Scope.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000820; Untold stories of civic participation; Active; 2006
